sentences.en: Because of the torrid weather, the Dubai desert journey usually begins at nightfall.
sentences.cn: 由于天气炎热, 迪拜周围的沙漠之旅一般都在傍晚展开.

sentences.en: She almost can tolerate any kind of torrid days.
sentences.cn: 她几乎能忍受各种酷热的天气.

sentences.en: She was sitting on the rocks in the torrid sun.
sentences.cn: 她头顶灼热的骄阳坐在岩石上.

sentences.en: Sitting on the tremendous rocks in the torrid sun, Roger received this news as an illumination.
sentences.cn: 在酷热的阳光下,罗杰坐在大岩石上, 听到这个消息,得到一种启发.

sentences.en: So even the most torrid affair should be conducted with a decided sense of propriety.
sentences.cn: 这样即使是再狂热的爱情也应该把握分寸有所克制.

sentences.en: Some people live in Torrid Zone.
The autumn sun illuminates every corner of the land, it's warm but not torrid.
sentences.cn: 秋日普照大地, 温暖而不炎热.

sentences.en: The minister suffered yet another torrid day of criticism.
sentences.cn: 在不绝于耳的批评声中，这位部长又挨过了难熬的一天。
